mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM schedule_record r WHERE r.date = #{dateNow} AND r.user_id IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE org_id = #{orgId} AND del_flag = 0 ) AND r.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY r.date DESC

SELECT r.item_id,r.user_id FROM schedule_record r left join schedule_item si on si.id = r.item_id WHERE r.del_flag = 0 and si.is_rest_day != 0
and date_format(r.date ,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_sub(date_format(#{date} ,'%Y-%m-%d'),interval 1 day) and time_id = 1
and date_format(r.date ,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{date} ,'%Y-%m-%d') and time_id = 0
AND r.user_id IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE org_id = #{orgId} AND del_flag = 0 ) ORDER BY r.date DESC
